comment: Absolute trashfire of a game. Not really a game, more like a torture device.
The rule set for this easy dice chucking game feels outdated, no wonder it's from the 1980s. Almost no ways to mitigate the luck of the dice, really bad so many better games out there.

Drinking Game. Whenever you fail you have to drink!
This Version i would rate a 7
Draw a card with a goal (bonus), roll some dice and PYL. Simple, straightforward but certainly not mindblowingly interesting.
[NR] (#125) This is a cool dice rolling press your luck game that I have owned since high school.

Schnelles Würfelspiel.
Wer zuerst 6000 Punkte erzielt, hat gewonnen.
We can always play another round...
Terrific little game of push your luck.
I love dice games, and my family does too! Quite popular game at our gatherings!
